title: Emergence
description: A new breed of nightmareBroken relationships. Broken heart. Broken world.Ember has left illusions behind in Somraque, but reality is just as treacherous in a land where nothing is static. Not even the ground beneath her feet.To find the missing fragment and fulfil the prophecy, she has to rebuild the trust left in ashes in the Whispers. While Mordecai might have placed his faith in his enemies, will they be able to do the same to the monster in their midst?And more importantlyâ€”can a Savior even exist in a world that does not want to be saved?
author: Gaja J. Kos
